diag.title: Express Diagnosis
diag.subtitle: 4 quick questions. Then, 30 minutes of direct conversation about your business.
diag.step1.question: Who are you and what's your business?
diag.step1.hint: Just the basics so we don't start from scratch.
diag.step2.question: What's your business segment?
diag.step2.hint: This helps me bring relevant references to the conversation.
diag.seg.health.title: Healthcare
diag.seg.beauty.title: Beauty & Aesthetics
diag.seg.retail.title: Retail
diag.seg.services.title: Services
diag.seg.food.title: Food & Beverage
diag.seg.other.title: Other
diag.step3.question: Do you already have a website?
diag.step3.hint: No judgment. Most businesses I work with don't — and that's fine.
diag.site.none.title: No website
diag.site.bad.title: Have one, but...
diag.site.good.title: Have one and it works
diag.site.good.desc: But I want to improve it
diag.site.ig.title: Just Instagram
diag.step4.question: What bothers you most today?
diag.step4.hint: About your digital presence, online service, or any business process. 1-2 sentences is great.
diag.step4.placeholder: e.g. I lose customers because I don't show up on Google... / I get WhatsApp messages and take too long to reply... / I don't even know where to start...
